# invert-kv

> Invert the key/value of an object. Example: `{foo: 'bar'}` → `{bar: 'foo'}`

## Install

```text
$ npm install invert-kv
```

## Usage

```javascript
const invertKv = require('invert-kv');

invertKv({foo: 'bar', unicorn: 'rainbow'});
//=> {bar: 'foo', rainbow: 'unicorn'}
```
